description:
The master of surrealism, Monsieur Daré had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen. Inspector Magrey deduces that the culprit is Lupin, and provokes him through television. But Lupin wants to find out the truth; he disguises himself as Magrey to go visit Daré ...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lupin Vs. the Mystery Man With Two Faces
